subject: Antitrust Laws and Competition Issues
Sex Crimes
Colleges and Universities
College Athletics
Suits and Litigation
Child Abuse and Neglect
lead_paragraph: Governor Tom Corbett of Pennsylvania said Wednesday that the penalties imposed by the N.C.A.A. against Penn State for its child sexual abuse scandal violated federal antitrust laws.
snippet: Governor Tom Corbett of Pennsylvania said Wednesday that the penalties imposed by the N.C.A.A. against Penn State for its child sexual abuse scandal violated federal antitrust laws.
